# Info String Keys

**API Collection**

Key values of properties to get and set using Audio File Services functions and provide a common way to get the same information out of several different kinds of files.

## Constants

- **kAFInfoDictionary_Artist**: An artist.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Album**: An album.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Tempo**: A tempo.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_KeySignature**: A key signature.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_TimeSignature**: A time signature.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_TrackNumber**: A track number.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Year**: A year.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Composer**: A composer.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Lyricist**: A lyricist.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Genre**: A genre.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Title**: A title.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_RecordedDate**: A recorded date.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Comments**: Comments.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_Copyright**: Copyright.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_SourceEncoder**: A source encoder.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_EncodingApplication**: An encoding application.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_NominalBitRate**: A nominal bit rate.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_ChannelLayout**: A channel layout.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_ApproximateDurationInSeconds**: An approximate duration in seconds.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_SourceBitDepth**: The bit depth of the source audio stream.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_ISRC**: An International Standard Recording Code.
- **kAFInfoDictionary_SubTitle**: A subtitle.

## Constants

- **AudioFileTypeID**: Operating system constants that indicate the type of file to be written or a hint about what type of file to expect from data provided.
- **Audio File Creation Flags**: Flags to set when creating an audio file.
- **AudioFilePermissions**: Flags for use when opening an audio file.
- **Audio File Loop Direction Constants**: The playback direction of a looped segment of an audio file.
- **Audio File Marker Types**: A type of marker within a file used in the `mType` field of the [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AudioFileMarker] structure.
- **AudioFileRegionFlags**: Flags that specify a playback direction for an audio file region structure.
- **Audio File Packet Translation Flags**: Flags specified in a packet translation structure.
- **Audio File Properties**: Properties used by the functions described in getting and setting pieces of data in audio files. See Working with Global Information for details.
- **Audio File Global Info Properties**: Access these properties using the functions described in Working with Global Information.
